footer.tagline: Taking care of your smile with excellence
footer.description: Modern dental clinic, specialized in aesthetic treatments and oral rehabilitation, with experienced professionals and state-of-the-art equipment.

1.title: Teeth Whitening
1.description: Restore the natural whiteness of your teeth with modern, safe and painless treatments

2.title: Dental Veneers
2.description: Transform your smile with ultra-thin high-quality porcelain veneers

3.title: Dental Implants
3.description: Definitive and safe solution for tooth replacement with advanced technology

4.title: Modern Orthodontics
4.description: Align your teeth with latest generation appliances that are comfortable and efficient

5.title: Prevention and Complete Check-up
5.description: Keep your oral health impeccable with periodic evaluations and preventive care

6.title: Endodontics (Root Canal Treatment)
6.description: Modern endodontic treatment, virtually painless with rapid recovery

1.name: Dr. Ana Paula Ferreira
1.bio: Specialist in dental implants and oral rehabilitation with over 15 years of experience. Post-graduate from ABO-PR.

2.name: Dr. Carlos Eduardo Mendes
2.bio: Specialist in modern orthodontics and invisible aligners. Member of the Brazilian Society of Orthodontics.

3.name: Dr. Mariana Costa Lima
3.bio: Specialist in aesthetic dentistry, dental veneers and orofacial harmonization. International certification in smile design.

4.name: Dr. Rafael Oliveira Santos
4.bio: Specialist in root canal treatments with operative microscopy. Certified by the Brazilian Society of Endodontics.

1.name: Maria Helena Santos
1.text: Excellent service! I had two dental implants done with Dr. Ana Paula and the results exceeded my expectations. Modern clinic, attentive team and very professional. I highly recommend!

2.name: Jo√£o Pedro Silva
2.text: I had laser teeth whitening done and I'm impressed with the results. Quick, painless procedure and my smile looks much better. The team is extremely competent!

3.name: Ana Carolina Ribeiro
3.text: I had dental veneers done with Dr. Mariana and my smile looks incredible! The service was impeccable from the first consultation. Beautiful, clean clinic and very well equipped. Worth every penny!

4.name: Roberto Almeida Costa
4.text: I was afraid to have a root canal done, but Dr. Rafael was exceptional. Painless procedure, very careful and with all the technology. Changed my perception about dentists!

5.name: Juliana Martins Prado
5.text: I started my orthodontic treatment with invisible aligners and I already see a big difference! Dr. Carlos is very attentive and explains everything in detail. I loved the clinic experience!
